Description:
INSJD200122.1 - 312206510
You have failed to ensure that the exposure of your employees to welding fume is adequately controlled in that you have not provided Local Exhaust Ventilation where employees are carrying out regular and high intensity welding.

INSJD200122.2- 312206541 
You have failed to ensure that the respiratory protective equipment provided to control exposure of employees to substances hazardous to health, namely welding fume, has been thoroughly examined and tested at suitable intervals.

INSJD200122.3-312206562
You have failed to make and give effect to appropriate arrangements for the monitoring and maintenance of your water-mix metal working fluid - in that you do not (a) undertake weekly testing of the metal working fluid by appropriate tests i.e. pH and concentration; and you do not (b) have effective procedures for remedial actions on the basis of the test results.
